B

br.com.armange.commons.spi - package br.com.armange.commons.spi
Utility package for service loading.
br.com.armange.commons.spi.exception - package br.com.armange.commons.spi.exception
 

L

Loader - Class in br.com.armange.commons.spi
A simple service-provider loading facility.
loadService(Class<T>) - Static method in class br.com.armange.commons.spi.Loader
Loads a single service implementation according the given service interface(class).
loadServices(Class<T>, boolean) - Static method in class br.com.armange.commons.spi.Loader
Loads a stream of service implementations according the given service interface(class).
loadServices(Class<T>) - Static method in class br.com.armange.commons.spi.Loader
Loads a stream of service implementations according the given service interface(class).

N

NoImplementationFoundException - Exception in br.com.armange.commons.spi.exception
Thrown to indicate that no implementations was found for the given service type.
NoImplementationFoundException(Class<?>) - Constructor for exception br.com.armange.commons.spi.exception.NoImplementationFoundException
Delegates to the super constructor, passing a string message ("The service implementation [%s] was not found").
